thread.title: Anonymous Bibliophile
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Anonymous Bibliophile

author: Anonymous Bibliophile
title: Anonymous Bibliophile
text: I've had almost exclusively wonderful experiences with Thrift Books. Sometimes, they don't have the book I'm looking for (especially if it's rather new or rare) and once, I ordered a book that arrived in much worse condition than what was promised; but I was given a full refund, no questions. Thrift Books is great for those of us that want to build our library without breaking the bank... one of my proudest book-lover moments was ordering nine like-new books for roughly 32 bucks. Can't beat that with a bat!
